name: react-native-webgpu
description: Coming soon. A [WebGPU](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WebGPU_API) port for react native which aims to provide direct access to Metal and Vulkan for iOS and Android, and support for libraries like [Three.js](https://threejs.org).
author: Sean Henry <sean.henry6@gmail.com>
